metadata.title: CVE-2023-22796 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A regular expression based DoS vulnerability in Active Support <6.1.7.1 and<7.0.4.1. A specially crafted string passed to the underscore method cancause the regular expression engine to enter a state of catastrophicbacktracking. This can cause the process to use large amounts of CPU andmemory, leading to a possible DoS vulnerability.

criterions.comment: rails package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
